timeline.message:
test: rename integration test

Rename the SessionPoolIntegrationTest to IT... so it is actually picked up
by the configuration that executes the integration tests.

timeline.bodyText: nit: move session2 declaration into the try with resources block
timeline.author: thiagotnunes

timeline.bodyText: WDYT about adding timeouts to the get calls for the futures (in order not to block indefinitely)?
timeline.author: thiagotnunes

replies.bodyText: I would prefer not do that, as the client library also calls PooledSessionFuture.get() without a timeout, and I would prefer to keep these consistent with the behavior of the client library itself. Instead, the test case itself will eventually timeout if the calls should block indefinitely.
replies.author: olavloite

timeline.message: cleanup: move declaration to try-with-resources block
